work.request.progress: whitespace-nowrap px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium bg-purple-100 text-purple-800 border border-purple-200
work.response.progress: whitespace-nowrap px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium bg-purple-200 text-purple-900 border border-purple-300
work.request.revision: whitespace-nowrap px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800 border border-yellow-200
work.response.revision: whitespace-nowrap px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium bg-orange-100 text-orange-800 border border-orange-200
work.request.finish: whitespace-nowrap px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium bg-blue-100 text-blue-800 border border-blue-200
work.response.finish: whitespace-nowrap px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium bg-green-100 text-green-800 border border-green-200
work.request.cancel: whitespace-nowrap px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium bg-red-100 text-red-800 border border-red-200
work.response.cancel: whitespace-nowrap px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium bg-red-200 text-red-900 border border-red-300
